Rapid Search offers the highest quality results by changing your search engine to Bing, delivering rapid results without compromising your privacy so you’re always protected.

The best in news, videos, images and search are available at the click of a button with this easy to use and functional extension making your life easier.

Discover a new way to find what you need with the dynamic Bing search engine; known for its high quality images, reward system and tight security measures so you can search with confidence.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the RapidSearch extension and setting Chrome™ New Tab and default search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. The extension will update your search settings and will change your New Tab and default search services provided by Bing

About Us - https://www.rapidsearch.site/about-us
EULA - https://www.rapidsearch.site/eula
Privacy Policy - https://www.rapidsearch.site/privacy-policy
